jobs.title: Marketing Manager
jobs.description:
Role description

We are currently hiring a Marketing Manager with strong digital-marketing and demand-generation experience within an enterprise-SaaS environment to help Fabriq with its 2020 growth plans. This is a full-time position based in London.

This is a very hands-on role, essential in supporting Fabriq’s overall marketing efforts and you will report directly to the CEO. We are a small team, so there is a lot of space to develop, bring in your own ideas and get actively involved in shaping the direction of the marketing strategy.

Specific duties

* Participate in overall marketing planning (including content planning) and help develop themes that can be translated into demand-generation campaigns
* Execute all elements of such campaigns by writing/proofreading content, crafting suitable marketing assets (social posts, email & ad copy, small design jobs), managing the delivery through digital channels, ensuring the results are tracked, and reporting on performance
* Help increase awareness and adoption of the analytics platform Fabriq OS by implementing SEO best-practices, running paid search/social campaigns and optimising inbound lead conversion
* Help move leads down the sales funnel through content marketing, nurturing campaigns and automated workflows using sales enablement assets
* Own the operation and continuous optimisation of all existing digital channels (search, social, paid social, e-mail, website & web traffic analytics)

Desired qualifications and skills

* 4+ years of experience implementing integrated digital marketing campaigns in a B2B environment, including content / asset creation and measuring / reporting on performance
* Practical knowledge of CRM and marketing automation tools (e.g. HubSpot), and experience using reporting tools (e.g. Google Analytics) to guide decision making
* Experience with SEM/paid-search campaigns (Google) and paid social campaigns (LinkedIn)
* An eye for design / brand consistency with basic capability to perform simple creative jobs
* Interest in working in one or more of the following sectors: energy efficiency, sustainability, CSR, cleantech, PropTech, enterprise SaaS
* Orientation towards achieving results autonomously and creatively in an entrepreneurial setting

Beneficial skills

* Certification in HubSpot Marketing (or similar), Google Ads and/or Google Analytics
* Best-practice knowledge about creating digital-marketing content (e.g. whitepapers, blog/social posts, videos, etc.)
* An understanding of buyer journeys/personas for enterprise-SaaS products


BONUS:

1) Fluency in European languages – particularly German, French, and Spanish
2) Experience in energy, sustainability management, sustainability, and/or commercial real estate 


NOTE 1: Only candidates with the right to work in the UK can be considered for this opening.

NOTE 2: NO AGENCIES PLEASE
